about_the_game:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Pediatric Rare Disease Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Pediatric Rare Disease Package:

  • 8yo M Fever (Tmax = 38.6C / 101.5 F) at home today
  • 3yo M with R sided Limp
  • 10yo M with HA and Dizziness
  • 9yo F with face swelling
  • 11yo M with facial swelling, AMS, and respiratory distress
  • 5yo F with fatigue and new bruising
  • 10yo M Unresponsive
  • 7yo M with HA and vomiting
  • 19mo M with Seizure
detailed_description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Pediatric Rare Disease Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Pediatric Rare Disease Package:

  • 8yo M Fever (Tmax = 38.6C / 101.5 F) at home today
  • 3yo M with R sided Limp
  • 10yo M with HA and Dizziness
  • 9yo F with face swelling
  • 11yo M with facial swelling, AMS, and respiratory distress
  • 5yo F with fatigue and new bruising

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320 M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
